Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item holds immense value for us and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $12000. We understand that the true worth of the product may vary based on your needs and expectations, so we invite you to consider the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship involved. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of prompt delivery and excellent customer service. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
